resources.string: Turn off all the lights to win!
Solve the riddle below to find a shortcut

"In darkness, I'm a beacon, a luminescent sight, Surrounded by companions, in a grid so tight. Amidst their glow, a hidden power resides, Hold me longer, and victory abides. Not a flicker or a spark, but a gentle, lasting hue, The answer lies within, can you unlock it, too?"
